name: Heir of Dreadauld
description:
In Heir of Dreadauld you take the role of the mighty giver. People and creatures from the entire kingdom will drop by and it is up to you to choose who will receive a gift and who will be denied. 

Every choice you make will have an impact, causing your reputation to rise or fall with the factions of the land.  Will you end up as part of the royal family or will you befriend the local beggar?

Will you be able to get all three endings?

Controls:

Left key - Choose the left person
Right key - Choose the right person

Credits:

Programming: Styrbjorn Andersson
Music: Styrbjorn Andersson
Graphics: Styrbjorn Andersson
Writing: Styrbjorn and Veronica Andersson

This game was made during the 48h Yogscast Game Jam 2019 https://itch.io/jam/yogscast-game-jam at the theme "Giving".
